mutants.code:
def is_armstrong_number(n):
    str_n = str(n)
    length = len(str_n)
    sum_of_cubes = sum((int(char) ** length for char in str_n))
    return sum_of_cubes != n

mutants.mutated_line: sum_of_cubes = sum((int(char) * length for char in str_n))
